resource.question: SELECT IF((SELECT cpu_socket FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400') = (SELECT cpu_socket FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e5200'), 'TRUE', 'FALSE' )
SELECT price FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400'
SELECT shop_url FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400'
SELECT cpu_socket FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400'
SELECT maker FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400'
SELECT maker FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT DISTINCT mb_name FROM mainboard WHERE maker='asus'
SELECT graphic_interface FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT cpu_socket FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT info_text FROM info WHERE info_keyword='pci-e'
SELECT MAX(date_released) FROM cpu_core ORDER BY date_released DESC
SELECT IF( (SELECT COUNT(hdd_interface_1) FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600')>0, 'TRUE', 'FALSE' )
SELECT extension_slot FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT graphic_card FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT audio_card FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT lan_card FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'
SELECT ABS((SELECT price FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400') - (SELECT price FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e5200') )
SELECT DISTINCT cpu_socket FROM mainboard WHERE maker='intel'
SELECT * FROM info WHERE info_keyword='am2' OR info_keyword='am3'
SELECT * FROM info WHERE info_keyword='sata' OR info_keyword='ata'
SELECT * FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400' OR cpu_name='e5200'
SELECT cpu_name, mb_name, cpu.price, mainboard.price FROM cpu, mainboard WHERE cpu.price + mainboard.price < 100000 ORDER BY cpu.clock_frequency+cpu.l2_cache DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT cpu_name, mb_name FROM cpu, mainboard WHERE cpu.cpu_socket = mainboard.cpu_socket AND clock_frequency+l2_cache = (SELECT MAX(clock_frequency+l2_cache) FROM cpu ) ORDER BY mainboard.price DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT cpu_name FROM cpu WHERE cpu.clock_frequency / cpu.price > 0 ORDER BY cpu.clock_frequency / cpu.price DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT maker FROM WHERE cpu='cpu'
